data.title: Sea View Cottage
data.meta_description: Sea View Cottage - A mid-terrace Victorian cottage nestled in Frinton-on-Sea, Essex. Woodburner. Enclosed garden. Sea views. Walton-on-the-Naze 1.7 miles; Clacton-on-Sea 7.1 miles.
data.text:
"Beautiful cottage in a perfect."

Location. The cottage is well presented.and.is well equipt. The owner goes the extra mile to ensure you have everything you need. We really enjoyed.our stay here.

Reviewed by Rachel5.0★Aug 2024

"Very nice cottage and lovely Jo the manager and her lemon drizzle went down nice with a cuppa tea on arrival x"

Reviewed by Pauline5.0★Jun 2024

"Clean and comfortable we would highly recommend it"

Reviewed by Robert5.0★Jun 2024

"Fantastic cottage, well equipped, beautifully decorated, comfy, great little woodburner that unfortunately the weather was too warm to use!"

Very close to beach, and a very short walk to the main shopping street. The owner Jo went out of her way to ensure we were happy and had a lovely holiday. Welcome pack was comprehensive and ensured we ate out at lovely places. Very highly recommended!

Reviewed by Stuart5.0★Jun 2024

"Really great accommodation in a perfect area for beach and high street."

Reviewed by Linda5.0★Apr 2024

"Sea View Cottage is a delightful little gem in the perfect place to enjoy Frinton."

The owner goes over and above to make your stay special. The facilities, cleanliness and decor are perfect and you couldn’t ask for more.

Thank you so much for your 5 star review, Pauline. I really appreciate the kind words and would love to welcome you back any time Property Owner

Reviewed by Pauline5.0★Sep 2023

"A delightful, stylish and spotless, well placed cottage."

The lush garden was so welcome and we ate our meals out there most evenings. The beach was a ten minute stroll away, as were the local shops, so a perfect location. We will be hopefully be back soon!

Thank you so much for your 5 star review Rosemary. I'm so pleased you both had a great stay and hope to welcome you back again soon. Property Owner

Reviewed by Rosemary5.0★Sep 2023

"Sea View is an immaculate holiday cottage."

We had a wonderful week. First-class standard of cleanliness and such attention to detail in equipping the house - even for the four-legged guests! The lovely garden is a real bonus and parking couldn’t have been easier. A quick walk to the sea and to the excellent High Street. Thank you, too, for the thoughtful treats to welcome us.

Thank you so much for your amazing review. It really means a lot. I hope to welcome you back to Sea View Cottage again soon. Property Owner

Reviewed by Jacqueline5.0★Jul 2023

"Sea view cottage was superb!"

We stepped into an immaculate little house , and were greeted with much needed essentials, but also a lovely homemade cake plus a bottle of wine, a really special touch. The owner had thought of absolutely everything you would need , and including lots of lovely things for four legged friends.. dog bed , towels, food and water bowls plus little biscuits. The garden was very secure and our dogs were very happy, as were we. We all spent hours down at the beach, and strolling up and down Frinton high street where there are dog friendly cafes/ restaurants. This is one of the best holiday lets we have stayed in. Thank you Jo.. We had a wonderful time.

Thank you so much for your really lovely review and comments. I'm so pleased you all had such a lovely time and would love to welcome you back soon. Jo Property Owner

Reviewed by Tracey5.0★Jul 2023

"Lovely property."

Fantastically clean and everything you need.

Thank you for your great review and comments, it's very much appreciated. Property Owner

Reviewed by Julie5.0★Jun 2023

"The cleanest, prettiest cottage I have ever stayed in."

I really didn’t want to leave ❤️

Thank you so much for your lovely review Sarah. Property Owner

Reviewed by Sarah5.0★Apr 2023

"Lovely place."

You really can see the sea! Frinton is a sweet town too. We appreciated the extras, eg a second set of keys, lovely welcome pack and extra blankets. Great stay for the dog too. I’d like to return

Thank you so much for your great review Heather, I'd be more than happy to welcome you back any time. Property Owner

Reviewed by Heather5.0★Apr 2023

"We had a lovely time despite the weather which was pretty bad."

The cottage was comfortable and provided all that we needed, close to the main street shops and the beaches. The location was ideal as we could walk either way on the coastal path. The host was courteous and communicated with us prior to arrival and departure.

Thank you so much for your great review Chris. I'm so pleased you enjoyed the cottage and had a great stay. I'd love to welcome you back to Sea View Cottage any time soon. Property Owner

Reviewed by Chris5.0★Mar 2023

"We had a wonderful stay and would really recommend it to anyone looking for a quiet few days at the seaside with dogs."

We hope to visit again one day

Thank you so much for your great review Rev marsh. I'm so pleased you enjoyed the cottage and had a great stay. I'd love to welcome you back to Sea View Cottage any time soon. Property Owner

Reviewed by Deborah5.0★Feb 2023

"It was a beautiful property to stay in and the little treats were lovely great stay thanks"

Thank you so much for your great review Tracey. I'm so pleased you enjoyed the cottage and had a great stay. I'd love to welcome you back to Sea View Cottage any time soon. Property Owner

Reviewed by Tracey5.0★Feb 2023

"Ideal property for a leisurely break in Frinton."

Spotlessly clean and ticks all boxes for an enjoyable stay. My Boston Terrier 'Merlot'

Thanks so much for your great feedback Rob. So pleased you and Merlot had an enjoyable stay. Come back again soon! Property Owner

Reviewed by Robert5.0★Jan 2023

"On arrival the property was absolutely spotless, great welcome tray of tea/coffee and lemon drizzle cake."

Loved the standard the house was fitted out to and the choice of furnishings. Very quiet location and slept so well during our stay. Great additional touches, dog bed, bowls and towels. Thanks again for a great stay.

Thank you so much for your lovely review Joanne. So pleased you loved the cottage so much and had a great stay. I'd love to welcome you back to Sea View Cottage any time soon. Property Owner

Reviewed by Joanne5.0★Dec 2022

"The house is very well located (walking distance from station, shops & beach) and extremely well equipped."

Ghost the husky loved the very large dog cushion. The owner provided Prosecco and delicious lemon cake! It would be good if a grab handle could be fitted on the wall in the bath to help those whose balance is not so good. Very high standard of cleanliness throughout.

Thank you so much for your lovely review Kay. I'm so pleased you all had a great time. I will of course look into getting a grab rail for the bath and I'd love to welcome you back to Sea View Cottage any time. Property Owner

Reviewed by Kay5.0★Dec 2022

"It was the second time we stayed at Sea View Cottage and will definitely be staying there again."

We had a lovely welcome of tea, coffee, milk and 2 pieces of wonderful lemondon drizzle cake each. The great surprise was we also had a nice bottle of Prosecco cooling in the fridge. The cottage is well equipped and the cleanliness is to an extremely high standard. The back garden was perfectly enclosed and our two dogs loved it. We were also impressed with the equipment to use for our littles pooches. Which included bowls, beds, Towells and poo bags!! The cottage is very well situated with Frinton beach nearby. Lots of variety of shops in the High Street with take-a-ways and cafes included. Lots of places to visit and good pubs too. We thoroughly recommend Sea View Cottage for a lovely restful and homely holiday.

Thank you so much for your really lovely review of Sea View Cottage. I'm so pleased you had a lovely week, despite the weather! Property Owner

Reviewed by Diega5.0★Nov 2022

"Well equipped, clean and comfortable property, well cared for by the owner."

Lovely location, close to the sea and local amenities. Would very happily return.

Thank you for your great feedback on Sea View Cottage. I hope to welcome you back some time in the future. Property Owner

Reviewed by Suzanne5.0★Oct 2022

"Sea View Cottage is a perfect base for a couple or family with young children."

We stayed here with our two dogs and had a wonderful time. The beach is a very short walk away and at the time we stayed (October) was entirely open to dogs. The cottage has everything we and the dogs needed and Jo, an excellent host, thoughtfully left a welcome pack of treats for our arrival. I must also add, that the information pack she has produced is extremely helpful. I would unhesitatingly recommend Sea View Cottage to others wanting a cosy, relaxing retreat by the sea.

Thank you so much for your kind words and really great review of Sea View Cottage. Property Owner

Reviewed by Hilary5.0★Oct 2022

"It is a very lovely cottage and in a perfect location for the beach and the shop and travelling around,"

Thank you for your great review of Sea View Cottage. Property Owner

Reviewed by Christopher4.7★Sep 2022

"We had a fantastic time and very lucky with the weather."

Thank you everything was amazing!

Reviewed by Mary5.0★Sep 2022

"The owner made us very welcome and the house was really well equipped."

It was an ideal spot for a beach break

Thank you for your great review of Sea View Cottage, it means a lot Property Owner

Reviewed by Sarah5.0★Jul 2022

"Lovely small property, spotlessly clean, close to the sea and a short walk from the main street with shops, cafes and restaurants."

Jo has gone above and beyond providing everything that you might need, and with a welcome pack which included a bottle of wine and homemade cake. Our only negative comment is that the chairs in the lounge are uncomfortable. We had a very enjoyable stay, highly recommended.

Reviewed by Liz4.7★Jul 2022

"The cottage was beautifully clean and welcoming on arrival."

Very modern furniture which was a little uncomfortable for a relaxing stay.Little hanging space in bedrooms which could be improved.Probably ideal for younger people.Great location for the beach and very close to local amenities.

Reviewed by James3.4★Jun 2022

"Very clean cottage & neat cottage good size garden for the dogs Bed very comfortable but not very comfortable settee or chairs & bit impractical not having a door on the kitchen & stairgate was useless to open when coming downstairs ."

The living area a tad small & only two of us Good location for beach & loved the whole resort of Frinton on Sea

I'm so pleased to hear you loved Frinton-on-Sea but very sorry to hear that the cottage living area did not meet your expectations. As a two up two down terraced property, the lounge could be considered small by some, but this is to be expected in these types of houses and as such I am unable to fit large sofas and chairs in this space. The door has been removed to give a more open plan feel to downstairs and I personally feel the space works better without it. I’m sorry you felt otherwise. Regarding the stair gate, I will, of course, look into this and make sure it is working correctly. I really do hope you enjoyed your stay despite these issues. Property Owner

Reviewed by Del4.1★Mar 2022

"Beautiful cottage."

Certainly home from home. Great location for sea and beach as well as the shops. Have rebooked already. Many thanks Jo for the welcome pack and making us so welcome

Dear Les, thank you so much for your lovely comments. I'm so pleased you loved the cottage and Frinton-on-Sea and can't wait to welcome you back. Jo Property Owner

Reviewed by Leslie5.0★Mar 2022

"Hadleigh cottage 100% home from home!"

Jo the owner has thought about everything you and your dog would need. Large lawned secure garden. Can see the sea at end of road from bench in front garden. Would definatly stay again and recommend it to friends and family.

Dear Carol, thank you so much for your great review! I'm so pleased you enjoyed your stay and would love to welcome you or any of your friends or family back to Sea View Cottage some time soon. Best wishes, Jo Property Owner

Reviewed by Carol5.0★Nov 2021

"We booked Sea View Cottage because of the location - it was convenient for meeting up with the family who live locally."

However, it exceeded our expectations - very clean, comfortable, everything you needed in the kitchen - it was just perfect for our needs. Jo made us feel very welcome with wine, cake, etc. and was very easily contactable to answer any queries/questions. We were very lucky with the weather and enjoyed walks along the seafront which was very peaceful as no amusements etc. All in all we were more than happy with Sea View Cottage.

Dear Jacqueline, thank you so much for your lovely review of Sea View Cottage. I'm so pleased it exceeded your expectations and would love to welcome you back at some stage in the future. Best wishes, Jo Property Owner

Reviewed by Jacqueline5.0★Nov 2021

"We had a wonderful stay at Sea View."

The house had all we needed and was tastefully decorated and very clean. It was very cosy and we enjoyed the quiet and neighbours were friendly. The garden was perfect for our two dogs and they loved walking to Frinton beach which was nearby. Also the shops were walking distance away. There are plenty of places to eat or get a take-away. This house is in a very good location for visiting, Clacton, Holland on Sea and Colchester. We would recommend Sea View and will definitely stay there again.

Reviewed by Diega5.0★Nov 2021

"We had a lovely stay for October half term week."

Location to the beach is good and it’s only a short walk until you are on the beach. Holidaying with two young teenagers meant good WiFi is essential and the tech facilities were great with good wi-if, Alexa, Amazon Prime and Netflix available. The cottage is also very close to the main shopping street and the kids often headed down there too to visit Ye Old Sweet shop and browse the traditional shops - great too see so many independents there. We were also delighted that some of Frinton’s cafes/restaurants allowed dogs inside so we could have a nice lunch or dinner with doggo joining us too. The cottage itself had everything we needed and was nicely decorated, absolutely spotless and beds had good bedding and very comfortable. Nice touches like a welcome pack, everything supplied in the kitchen such as dishwasher tablets, tea towels, foil, cling film were wonderful - I don’t see that very often! The only downside was that the lounge was very small and we found it difficult to watch tv or play games together (cards/chess/ etc all provided). I’d definitely recommend for couples with young children or older children but for us we need more room for the teens to lounge about downstairs.

Reviewed by Jacqueline4.7★Oct 2021

"Accommodation was excellent."

Everything you needed and more. Lovely location.

Reviewed by Linda5.0★Oct 2021

"Stunning cottage - immaculately clean with everything you could need."

Close to the beach. Perfect !

Reviewed by Ann5.0★Sep 2021

"This is a wonderful cottage with lots of homely, thoughtful touches."

The host Jo is very kind and helpful.

Reviewed by Helen5.0★Aug 2021

"Beautiful cottage in a fantastic location, everything we needed was on our doorstep."

Jo went over and above to ensure we had everything we needed in the cottage and provided excellent communication prior to our stay as well. The cottage was exceptionally clean and was a real home from home. Lots of useful local information provided too. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend or book another stay.

Reviewed by Emma5.0★Aug 2021

"Great location for a nice British seaside break, Nice and well kept property"

Reviewed by Mark5.0★Jul 2021

"Wonderful little holiday home, beautifully decorated, clean and cosy."

Morning coffee on the bench in front garden looking down towards the sea, early evening drinks in back garden which is sheltered and a sun trap at that time of day. Walking distance to beach and lovely high street with lots of great shops including fishmongers, butchers, bakery and deli. Great fish and chip shop. Great base to explore surrounding areas. We will be back and maybe hire a beach hut for fun!

Reviewed by Debbie5.0★May 2021

"We had a lovely stay in this beautiful property ."

Made to feel very welcome by the owner with Christmas tree and welcome gifts.Loved the location ,short walk to the seafront and to local shops ,cafés and restaurants.

Reviewed by Gary5.0★Dec 2020

"We had a wonderful weekend in Sea View Cottage."

It was absolutely spotlessly clean and really stylish and well equipped. I loved seeing the sea from the front of the house, and it was a 2 min walk to the beach. It was also really close to the shops and cafes of Frinton. We'll be back!

Reviewed by Emma5.0★Oct 2020

"Really lovely cottage."

Owner clearly goes the extra mile - really well equipped inventory, want for nothing, and a really thoughtful welcome pack. All really contributed to a lovely break.

Reviewed by Neil5.0★Oct 2020

"We knew what to expect because of the information we had been given."

We have stayed in this cottage before and chose to go back because we had a good experience previously. This cottage is in a very pleasant and convenient location. It is very easy to park outside. The cottage itself is clean, comfortable and very well appointed. Everything in the cottage works. The welcome pack is well written and very informative. It gave all the information we needed. There is a bicycle shed in the back garden.

Reviewed by Dympna5.0★Sep 2020

"Extremely clean and lovely furnished cottage."

Everything to a very high standard. Ideal position in Frinton for beach and the shops. Lovely street. Very pleasant owner.,

Reviewed by Janet5.0★Aug 2020

"The excellent holiday cottage, very clean and well looked after."

Thanks for a great stay.

Reviewed by James5.0★Jul 2020

"The cottage was well equipped and comfortable."

The owner had worked hard to prepare everything for an enjoyable holiday. We would definitely recommend the cottage.

Reviewed by Bronwen5.0★Jul 2020

"Very comfortable and cosy cottage."

Very well situated for where we needed to be to visit family over the new year holiday. Information pack very comprehensive, and lovely touch of home made cake, and basics of tea, coffee, and milk provided, plus the lovely bottle of bubbly! Definitely the best place we have stayed in the area , would certainly book again and confidently recommend to others. Keep up the standard and am sure it will do well .

Reviewed by Gillian4.4★Dec 2019

"This is a lovely little house just a short walk from the seafront."

There is even a glimpse of the sea from the front windows. We stayed at Christmas time and were touched to find a decorated tree and bottle of wine and cake waiting for us. The house is cosy and comfortable and warm and there is plenty of on street parking. We brought our dog With us and he loved the big cushion bed provided and the secure garden to play in. He also loved walks on the beach. Hadleigh Rd is pretty quiet and Its about a 10 minute flat walk to the shops on the high street. We would recommend this house,

Reviewed by Julia5.0★Dec 2019

"We had a fabulous time, the house is beautiful and spotless, comfortable bedding, everything you need."

The owner provided prosecco, milk and a wonderful lemon drizzle cake. Would definitely recommend this cottage.

Reviewed by Tamora5.0★Nov 2019

"Excellent location."

Information about entry accurate and easy to follow. Very good information folder in house. Well equipped cottage-everything worked and was clean and in good condition. We would almost certainly consider staying in the cottage again.

Reviewed by Dympna5.0★Oct 2019

"Lovely well equipped cottage."

Clean, comfy and a nice enclosed garden for the dog. Good location with beach 5 minutes walk one way and an array of shops 7 minutes the other. Would definitely stay again.

Reviewed by Roy5.0★Sep 2019

"House very well equipped and welcoming."

Lovely relaxed area. Thanks for the welcome gift of cake and wine, lovely touch. Would not hesitate to stay here again. So nice to be in such an uncommercialised area. Dog really enjoyed herself.

Reviewed by Ian5.0★Sep 2019
